ingredients.ingredient: 5 pounds boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch chunks

cookingTips: Soak wooden toothpicks in water for 30 minutes before using to prevent burning
Partially cook bacon so it's pliable but not fully crisp before wrapping
Mix sugar and ranch dressing powder together for a sweet and savory glaze
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user in assembling these bacon-wrapped appetizers by properly preparing the bacon and balancing sweet and savory glazes for crowd-pleasing results.
